Sample restructured with text removed from beginning. Two issues in clean sample: (1) Unicode replacement character 'fffd' appears in mid-sentence flow (complex garble, critical); (2) Inconsistent heading formatting 'A Thing Of Beauty Is a Joy' vs 'A Thing of Beauty Is a Joy' (minor punctuation/styling). Remaining errors impact text integrity.

Issues affect document integrity and attribution.

primary_issues: Unicode replacement characters in text flow
batch_summary.recommendation: Batch quality is generally excellent with 4 of 6 samples being error-free. Two samples (Vol56 and Vol57) have remaining issues primarily related to complex garbles and formatting artifacts that should be reviewed. These appear to be from more challenging OCR source material or edge cases in the cleanup process.
